title: Engineered DNA vaccine protects against emerging Mayaro virus infection

title_detail.value: Engineered DNA vaccine protects against emerging Mayaro virus infection

summary: A novel, synthetic DNA vaccine induces protective immunity against Mayaro virus (MAYV), a mosquito-borne infection endemic to South America, that has the potential to become a global emerging viral threat.

summary_detail.value: A novel, synthetic DNA vaccine induces protective immunity against Mayaro virus (MAYV), a mosquito-borne infection endemic to South America, that has the potential to become a global emerging viral threat.
